original_title: DC homeless rate 7 times higher than regional average despite budget | Fox News
article_summary: "President Trump's plan to address homelessness and clean up Washington, D.C. faces criticism, with the city's budget prioritizing progressive agenda items over homeless shelters. Trump's administration has adopted a no-tolerance policy for homeless encampments, removing 70 encampments so far, while some homeless individuals express support for the changes."</s>
